actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 in order to increase the maximum aggregate value of imported merchandise which may be informally entered into the United States from $250 to $500.

summary.text: Increase the maximum aggregate value of imported merchandise which may be informally entered into the United States from $250 to $500.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 in order to increase the maximum aggregate value of imported merchandise which may be informally entered into the United States from $250 to $500.
